body_html: Let me be a bit more clear. Suppose I wish to sample a value of shape (n,1) from a multivariate Gaussian distribution, I need the value of the mean and covariance matrix. I am now assuming that the covariance matrix is a diagonal matrix. The values of the diagonal are the output from a neural network. Now, this seems to be working good when I keep the batch size to be 1. When I want a batch size greater than one (take m), I want to sample m of such values from m different Gaussian distribution having different mean and variance. Implementing this has become a challenge for me. I am not getting any issue which has tackled this before.
